attributes.action: The UK should reject The Great Reset promoted by The World Economic Forum.
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK have totally rejected globalist socialism and its derivatives by voting to be independent from the EU. This latest iteration of global socialism promoted by The World Economic Forum is titled "The Great Reset" and it seeks to reset the world economy and collapse many industries in favour of ones it seems worthy to continue.
attributes.background:
The UK Parliament should debate the changes to our society brought about by The Great Reset. 

Once it becomes clear what the changes mean for the British people, a referendum should take place to establish the will of the British people with regard to The Great Reset.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The UK Government and Parliament haven't adopted 'the Great Reset'.  It's not clear from your petition what specific things you would like Government to commit not to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
